Name: Hidden Object Vacation
About the game: Do you like hidden objects games? Then go on a journey and immerse yourself in the culture and traditions of different countries! You'll visit over 150 cities in 7 countries, find over 10,000 hidden objects, and discover amazing facts about world-famous landmarks and historical places. Enjoy wonderful themed music that will make you feel the atmosphere of each country better. Hours of fun and relaxation for the whole family are guaranteed. We are constantly working on new updates and soon many more great locations from different countries will appear in the game. Train your brain, compete with other players from all over the world and win! Download the Hidden Object Vacation puzzle game right now! This is only a hidden object game, nothing else! No story lines nothing else for you to do but find objects! Earn all possible stars in 3 game modes in each location - word find, silhouette and scrambled letters. Two game modes - relaxed and timed will let you challenge your brain even more! Remember - hidden objects can be everywhere!
